```holoscript
composition "FoggyForest" {
  
  environment {
    theme: "forest_dense_fog"
    time_of_day: "morning"
    
    lighting {
      global_illumination: true
      ambient_color: 0x667788
      ambient_intensity: 0.4
      sun_direction: [0.5, 0.8, 0.3]
      sun_intensity: 0.3  // Dimmed by fog
    }
    
    fog {
      enabled: true
      color: 0xaabbcc
      density: 0.08
      near: 5
      far: 50
    }
    
    skybox: "assets/skyboxes/overcast_forest.hdr"
    
    audio {
      ambient: "forest_birds_distant"
      volume: 0.5
      reverb: 0.3
    }
  }
  
  // Ground plane
  object ground {
    mesh: "plane"
    scale: [100, 1, 100]
    position: [0, 0, 0]
    
    trait Material {
      texture: "assets/textures/forest_floor.jpg"
      repeat: [20, 20]
      roughness: 0.9
    }
    
    collider: "box"
    isStatic: true
  }
  
  // Procedural tree placement
  spatial_group "Trees" {
    scatter {
      prefab: "TreePine"
      count: 50
      area: [-40, -40, 40, 40]
      min_distance: 3
      random_rotation_y: true
      random_scale: [0.8, 1.2]
    }
  }
}
```

prompt: Create a night sky with stars and moon
completion:
<thinking>
Nighttime scene needs:
1. Dark ambient lighting
2. Moonlight as directional light
3. Star skybox or procedural stars
4. Optional: moon object
5. Night ambient sounds
</thinking>

```holoscript
composition "NightSky" {
  
  environment {
    time_of_day: "night"
    
    lighting {
      ambient_color: 0x112233
      ambient_intensity: 0.15
      
      // Moonlight
      directional {
        color: 0xaaccff
        intensity: 0.4
        direction: [0.3, 0.7, 0.2]
        cast_shadows: true
      }
    }
    
    sky {
      type: "procedural"
      star_density: 0.8
      star_brightness: 0.6
      milky_way: true
      atmosphere_color: 0x0a1020
    }
    
    audio {
      ambient: "night_crickets_owls"
      volume: 0.4
    }
  }
  
  // Moon
  object moon {
    mesh: "sphere"
    scale: [2, 2, 2]
    position: [100, 80, -50]
    
    trait Material {
      color: 0xffffee
      emissive: 0xffffee
      emissive_intensity: 0.8
    }
    
    // Subtle glow effect
    effect Glow {
      color: 0xffffee
      intensity: 0.5
      radius: 5
    }
  }
  
  // Ambient fireflies
  particle_system "Fireflies" {
    position: [0, 1, 0]
    area: [30, 5, 30]
    count: 50
    
    particle {
      size: 0.05
      color: 0xffff44
      emissive: 0xffff44
      lifetime: [2000, 4000]
    }
    
    behavior {
      movement: "wander"
      speed: 0.3
      blink: true
      blink_rate: [500, 1500]
    }
  }
}
```

prompt: Set up a VR room with proper lighting for UI readability
completion:
<thinking>
VR UI readability requires:
1. Even ambient lighting (no harsh shadows on UI)
2. Comfortable room scale
3. Neutral colors that don't strain eyes
4. UI panels at ergonomic distances
5. Soft lighting without glare
</thinking>

```holoscript
composition "VRRoom" {
  
  environment {
    // Soft, even lighting for UI
    lighting {
      ambient_color: 0xffffff
      ambient_intensity: 0.6
      
      // Soft fill lights from multiple angles
      point_light "fill_front" {
        position: [0, 3, -2]
        color: 0xffffff
        intensity: 0.4
        cast_shadows: false
      }
      
      point_light "fill_back" {
        position: [0, 3, 2]
        color: 0xffffff
        intensity: 0.3
        cast_shadows: false
      }
    }
    
    // Neutral background
    sky {
      type: "solid"
      color: 0x1a1a2e
    }
  }
  
  // Room bounds
  object floor {
    mesh: "plane"
    scale: [6, 1, 6]
    position: [0, 0, 0]
    
    trait Material {
      color: 0x2a2a3e
      roughness: 0.8
    }
    
    collider: "box"
    isStatic: true
  }
  
  // Comfortable UI distance (1.5-2m)
  spatial_group "UI_Zone" {
    
    object main_panel {
      prefab: "UIPanel"
      position: [0, 1.5, -1.8]  // Eye level, arm's reach
      scale: [0.8, 0.5, 1]
      look_at: "user"
    }
    
    object side_panel_left {
      prefab: "UIPanel"
      position: [-1.2, 1.4, -1.2]
      rotation: [0, 30, 0]
      scale: [0.4, 0.6, 1]
    }
    
    object side_panel_right {
      prefab: "UIPanel"
      position: [1.2, 1.4, -1.2]
      rotation: [0, -30, 0]
      scale: [0.4, 0.6, 1]
    }
  }
  
  // Ground reference for comfort
  object ground_grid {
    mesh: "plane"
    scale: [6, 1, 6]
    position: [0, 0.01, 0]
    
    trait Material {
      texture: "assets/textures/grid_subtle.png"
      opacity: 0.2
      transparent: true
    }
  }
}
```

<thinking>
Underwater scene needs:
1. Blue-green color grading
2. Fog for depth perception
3. Caustic light effects
4. Particle bubbles
5. Muffled/reverb audio
6. Slow ambient motion
</thinking>

```holoscript
composition "UnderwaterWorld" {
  
  environment {
    theme: "underwater"
    
    lighting {
      ambient_color: 0x1a4a6a
      ambient_intensity: 0.5
      
      // Sunlight filtering through water
      directional {
        color: 0x88ccff
        intensity: 0.6
        direction: [0, 1, 0.2]
      }
      
      // Caustic light projection
      caustics {
        enabled: true
        texture: "assets/textures/caustics.png"
        speed: 0.5
        scale: 3
        intensity: 0.4
      }
    }
    
    fog {
      enabled: true
      color: 0x1a4a6a
      density: 0.04
      near: 2
      far: 30
    }
    
    // Color grading for underwater look
    post_processing {
      color_tint: 0x88aacc
      saturation: 0.8
      vignette: 0.3
    }
    
    audio {
      ambient: "underwater_ambience"
      volume: 0.6
      reverb: 0.8  // Heavy reverb underwater
      lowpass: 800  // Muffled sounds
    }
  }
  
  // Bubble particles rising
  particle_system "Bubbles" {
    position: [0, -5, 0]
    area: [20, 1, 20]
    
    particle {
      mesh: "sphere"
      size: [0.02, 0.08]
      color: 0xaaddff
      opacity: 0.6
      lifetime: [5000, 10000]
    }
    
    emission {
      rate: 10
      velocity: [0, 1.5, 0]
      velocity_randomness: 0.3
    }
    
    behavior {
      wobble: true
      wobble_amount: 0.2
    }
  }
  
  // Floating seaweed
  spatial_group "Seaweed" {
    scatter {
      prefab: "SeaweedCluster"
      count: 30
      area: [-15, -15, 15, 15]
      y_position: -5  // Ocean floor
    }
  }
  
  // Ambient fish
  object fish_school {
    prefab: "FishSchool"
    position: [0, 0, 5]
    
    behavior {
      type: "flocking"
      count: 20
      speed: 2
      area: [10, 5, 10]
    }
  }
}
```
